goal.ch:
“˙學生在修習完本課程後，能透過搜尋與閱讀論文，掌握機器人學的最新技術與脈絡。
After taking this course, students can know state of the art robotics technology and roadmap through paper survey and reading. 
˙學生在修習完本課程後，能將數學理論透過程式實現在機器人平台上。
After taking this course, students can implement mathematical theory to programs on robotic platforms.“
goal.en:
“After taking this course, students can know state of the art robotics technology and roadmap through paper survey and reading.
After taking this course, students can implement mathematical theory to programs on robotic platforms.“

outline.ch:
“四、課程大網：(須中英對照，中文翻譯不妥，英文亦可)
1. Introduction to robot operating system (ROS)
2. Unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV)
3. Mobile robots
4. Perception algorithms
5. Decision-making algorithms
6. 3D mapping
7. 3D searching
8. Robot data analysis“
outline.en:
“四、課程大網：(須中英對照，中文翻譯不妥，英文亦可)
1. Introduction to robot operating system (ROS)
2. Unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV)
3. Mobile robots
4. Perception algorithms
5. Decision-making algorithms
6. 3D mapping
7. 3D searching
8. Robot data analysis“

textbook.ch: There is no textbook. Students need to read and present state of the art research papers.
textbook.en: There is no textbook. Students need to read and present state of the art research papers.

ch: 指定課程:必須先修MA5039、先修MA5041。
en: Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementMA5039、Prerequisite Course RequirementMA5041 only.
